document.heading: Cherry Blossom Festival Grant Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2025

To make, on an emergency basis, due to congressional review, a technical correction to the Fiscal Year 2025 Budget Support Act of 2024 regarding the transfer of funds to be used for a grant for the National Cherry Blossom Festival.
document.text: BE IT ENACTED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this act may be cited as the "Cherry Blossom Festival Grant Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2025".

section.text: Section 2112(b) of the Fiscal Year 2025 Budget Support Act of 2024, effective September 18, 2024 (D.C. Law 25-217; 71 DCR 9990), is amended by striking the figure "$1 million" and inserting the figure "$1.5 million" in its place.
section.codify:annotation: For the requirement that, in Fiscal Year 2025, $1.5 million shall be transferred to the Washington Convention and Sports Authority ("Events DC") to use for a matching grant program to administer the 2025 National Cherry Blossom Festival ("Program"), see section 2 of D.C. Act 26-20.

section.heading: Applicability.
section.text: This act shall apply as of October 1, 2024.

section.heading: Fiscal impact statement.
section.text: The Council adopts the fiscal impact statement of the Budget Director as the fiscal impact statement required by section 4a of the General Legislative Procedures Act of 1975, approved October 16, 2006 (120 Stat. 2038; D.C. Official Code ยง 1-301.47a).

section.heading: Effective date.
section.text: This act shall take effect following approval by the Mayor (or in the event of veto by the Mayor, action by the Council to override the veto), and shall remain in effect for no longer than 90 days, as provided for emergency acts of the Council of the District of Columbia in section 412(a) of the District of Columbia Home Rule Act, approved December 24, 1973 (87 Stat. 788; D.C. Official Code ยง 1-204.12(a)).
